btnreadme.label: Open Readme
btnreadme._comment: Do not change the function name! Ever!!

run_only_when_live.label: Accept Commands Only When Live
run_only_when_live.tooltip: Indicates whether the script only accepts commands while you are live.

command_name.label: Command Name
command_name.tooltip: What would you like the bot to detect as the command name after the exclamation mark?

command_permissions.label: Command Permissions
command_permissions.tooltip: The permission level required to use script commands.

subscription_exercise_type.label: Subscription Exercise Type
subscription_exercise_type.tooltip: Which exercise would you like to have to do after subs?

subscription_exercise_increment.label: Subscription Exercise Increment
subscription_exercise_increment.tooltip: How many exercise reps would you like to do after each sub?

show_response_on_subscription.label: Response on Subscription
show_response_on_subscription.tooltip: Show a thank-you message. Blank = off. Parameters: $channel, $exercise, $count.

client_id.label: Twitch Client ID
client_id.tooltip: Enter the client ID for your registered application.

twitch_oauth_token.label: Twitch oAuth Token
twitch_oauth_token.tooltip: Enter an oAuth token that allows the bot to read channel point redemptions on the channel being watched.

btnGetToken.label: Get Token
btnGetToken.tooltip: Generate an oAuth Token for the watched twitch account with permissions to read subscriptions.

reconnect_interval.label: Auto-reconnection interval
reconnect_interval.tooltip: How long, in minutes, does the script go between auto reconnection attempts?

debug_level.label: Level of Chatbot Logging
debug_level.tooltip: Choose verbosity of chatbot logging. Higher levels include all lower levels.

enable_logging_to_file.label: Enable File Logging
enable_logging_to_file.tooltip: If enabled, will log all levels of logging to script_log.txt in the script directory in addition to the Streamlabs Chatbot script log, useful for later reference.
